page.title: 13Events
page.content: The most important event of 1985 has been the end of the year long miners'{ {strike.}The strike ended on March 5 with the miners of Woolley Colliery grouping together and marching back to the mine under the Union banner.One recent visitor to Yorkshire was Dr. Billy Graham an American evangelist. Lots of people travelled from our local area to hear him preach in Sheffield. For the first time ever this year Barnsley organised a half{marathon road race,routed through Kexbrough and Cawthorne.The streets were lined with people cheering the competitors along.Annual events which are popular in the area include a Craft Fair at the High School and{galas}at Darton and Kexbrough.A new link road between Darton and Barugh was opened in 1985.
